f_time_lapse_plot<-function(dataframe, title, ylims, xlims){
  
  final_plot<- ggplot(dataframe) +
    geom_histogram(aes_(x=dataframe[,3]), binwidth = 100) +
    facet_wrap(~dataframe[,4]) +
    
    theme_bw() +
    ggtitle(title) +
    xlab("Fluorescence (a.u.)") +
    scale_x_continuous(limits=(xlims))+
    ylim(ylims)
  
  return(final_plot)
  
}

ylims<-list(c(0,200),c(0,250),c(0,300),c(0,100),c(0,200))
xlims<-list(c(10,75000),c(10,75000),c(10,100000),c(10,100000),c(10,100000))
titles<-list("cdc28, - aTc", "cdc28, + aTc",  "parent", "diploid strain","parent (N starved)")

f_ssc_vs_fsc_plot<-
  function(dataframe, title){
  
  final_plot<- ggplot(dataframe) +
    geom_density2d(aes_(x=dataframe[,1], y=dataframe[,2])) +
    facet_wrap(~dataframe[,4]) +
    
    theme_bw() +
    ggtitle(title) +
    xlab("FSC-W") +
    ylab("sSC-W") +
    xlim(60000,80000)+
    ylim(60000,80000)
  # +
  #   scale_x_continuous(limits=(xlims))+
  #   ylim(ylims)
  
  return(final_plot)
  
}
size_plots<-mapply(f_ssc_vs_fsc_plot, df_list, titles, SIMPLIFY = F)

size_plots

         MoreArgs = list(paste(output_path, "/size",sep=""), "", 10, 15), SIMPLIFY = F)
